name: clatglbcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: simprd(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(club, c0), c1), c2))
stmt.pretty: simprd((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` c1)∈ c2, ((lub ` c0)` c1)∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(club, c0), c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(club, c0), c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2)))

stmt.origin: clatlem(c0, c1, c2, cfv(club, c0), c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(club, c0), c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(club, c0), cfv(club, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(club, c0), cfv(club, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (lub ` c0)=(lub ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(glb ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))

comment: Any subset of the base set has a GLB in a complete lattice. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2011.)
